class Protocol ps where
  • data Message ps (st :: ps) (st' :: ps)
  • type StateAgency (st :: ps) :: Agency
  • type StateToken :: ps -> Type
name: Protocol StateToken StateAgency Message

display_html:
class StateTokenI st where
  • stateToken :: StateToken st
name: StateTokenI stateToken

display_html:
data PeerRole
  • = AsClient
  • | AsServer
name: PeerRole AsClient AsServer

display_html:
data SingPeerRole pr where
  • SingAsClient :: SingPeerRole AsClient
  • SingAsServer :: SingPeerRole AsServer
name: SingPeerRole SingAsClient SingAsServer

display_html:
data Agency where
  • ClientAgency :: Agency
  • ServerAgency :: Agency
  • NobodyAgency :: Agency
name: Agency ClientAgency ServerAgency NobodyAgency

display_html:
data SingAgency a where
  • SingClientAgency :: SingAgency ClientAgency
  • SingServerAgency :: SingAgency ServerAgency
  • SingNobodyAgency :: SingAgency NobodyAgency
name: SingAgency SingClientAgency SingServerAgency SingNobodyAgency

display_html:
data RelativeAgency where
  • WeHaveAgency :: RelativeAgency
  • TheyHaveAgency :: RelativeAgency
  • NobodyHasAgency :: RelativeAgency
name: RelativeAgency WeHaveAgency TheyHaveAgency NobodyHasAgency

display_html: type family Relative pr a where ...
name: Relative

display_html:
data ReflRelativeAgency a r r' where
  • ReflClientAgency :: ReflRelativeAgency ClientAgency r r
  • ReflServerAgency :: ReflRelativeAgency ServerAgency r r
  • ReflNobodyAgency :: ReflRelativeAgency NobodyAgency r r
name: ReflRelativeAgency ReflClientAgency ReflServerAgency ReflNobodyAgency

display_html: type WeHaveAgencyProof pr st = ReflRelativeAgency (StateAgency st) WeHaveAgency (Relative pr (StateAgency st))
name: WeHaveAgencyProof

display_html: type TheyHaveAgencyProof pr st = ReflRelativeAgency (StateAgency st) TheyHaveAgency (Relative pr (StateAgency st))
name: TheyHaveAgencyProof

display_html: type NobodyHasAgencyProof pr st = ReflRelativeAgency (StateAgency st) NobodyHasAgency (Relative pr (StateAgency st))
name: NobodyHasAgencyProof

display_html: type family FlipAgency pr where ...
name: FlipAgency

display_html:
class IsActiveState st (agency :: Agency) where
  • activeAgency :: ActiveAgency' st agency
name: IsActiveState activeAgency

display_html: type ActiveState st = IsActiveState st (StateAgency st)
name: ActiveState

display_html: notActiveState :: forall ps (st :: ps). StateAgency st ~ NobodyAgency => ActiveState st => StateToken st -> forall a. a
name: notActiveState

display_html: type ActiveAgency st = ActiveAgency' st (StateAgency st)
name: ActiveAgency

display_html:
data ActiveAgency' st agency where
  • ClientHasAgency :: StateAgency st ~ ClientAgency => ActiveAgency' st ClientAgency
  • ServerHasAgency :: StateAgency st ~ ServerAgency => ActiveAgency' st ServerAgency
name: ActiveAgency' ClientHasAgency ServerHasAgency

data N
  • = Z
  • | S N
name: N S Z

display_html:
data Nat (n :: N) where
  • pattern Succ :: () => m ~ S n => Nat n -> Nat m
  • pattern Zero :: () => Z ~ n => Nat n
name: Nat Succ Zero

display_html: natToInt :: Nat n -> Int
name: natToInt

display_html: unsafeIntToNat :: Int -> Nat n
name: unsafeIntToNat

display_html:
data Peer ps pr pl st m a where
  • Effect :: forall ps pr pl st m a. m (Peer ps pr pl st m a) -> Peer ps pr pl st m a
  • Yield :: forall ps pr pl (st :: ps) (st' :: ps) m a. (StateTokenI st, StateTokenI st', ActiveState st, Outstanding pl ~ Z) => WeHaveAgencyProof pr st -> Message ps st st' -> Peer ps pr pl st' m a -> Peer ps pr pl st m a
  • Await :: forall ps pr pl (st :: ps) m a. (StateTokenI st, ActiveState st, Outstanding pl ~ Z) => TheyHaveAgencyProof pr st -> (forall (st' :: ps). Message ps st st' -> Peer ps pr pl st' m a) -> Peer ps pr pl st m a
  • Done :: forall ps pr pl (st :: ps) m a. (StateTokenI st, StateAgency st ~ NobodyAgency, Outstanding pl ~ Z) => NobodyHasAgencyProof pr st -> a -> Peer ps pr pl st m a
  • YieldPipelined :: forall ps pr (st :: ps) (st' :: ps) c n st'' m a. (StateTokenI st, StateTokenI st', ActiveState st) => WeHaveAgencyProof pr st -> Message ps st st' -> Receiver ps pr st' st'' m c -> Peer ps pr (Pipelined (S n) c) st'' m a -> Peer ps pr (Pipelined n c) st m a
  • Collect :: forall ps pr c n st m a. (StateTokenI st, ActiveState st) => Maybe (Peer ps pr (Pipelined (S n) c) st m a) -> (c -> Peer ps pr (Pipelined n c) st m a) -> Peer ps pr (Pipelined (S n) c) st m a
name: Peer Done Yield Effect Await YieldPipelined Collect

display_html:
data PeerPipelined ps pr (st :: ps) m a where
  • PeerPipelined :: {..} -> PeerPipelined ps pr st m a
name: PeerPipelined PeerPipelined runPeerPipelined

display_html:
data Receiver ps pr st stdone m c where
  • ReceiverEffect :: m (Receiver ps pr st stdone m c) -> Receiver ps pr st stdone m c
  • ReceiverDone :: c -> Receiver ps pr stdone stdone m c
  • ReceiverAwait :: (StateTokenI st, ActiveState st) => TheyHaveAgencyProof pr st -> (forall st'. Message ps st st' -> Receiver ps pr st' stdone m c) -> Receiver ps pr st stdone m c
name: Receiver ReceiverEffect ReceiverAwait ReceiverDone

display_html:
data Driver ps (pr :: PeerRole) dstate m = Driver {
  • sendMessage :: forall (st :: ps) (st' :: ps). StateTokenI st => StateTokenI st' => ActiveState st => WeHaveAgencyProof pr st -> Message ps st st' -> m ()
  • recvMessage :: forall (st :: ps). StateTokenI st => ActiveState st => TheyHaveAgencyProof pr st -> dstate -> m (SomeMessage st, dstate)
  • initialDState :: dstate
}
name: Driver Driver sendMessage recvMessage initialDState

display_html:
data SomeMessage (st :: ps) where
  • SomeMessage :: (StateTokenI st, StateTokenI st', ActiveState st) => Message ps st st' -> SomeMessage st
name: SomeMessage SomeMessage

display_html: runPeerWithDriver :: forall ps (st :: ps) pr dstate m a. Monad m => Driver ps pr dstate m -> Peer ps pr NonPipelined st m a -> m (a, dstate)
name: runPeerWithDriver

display_html: runPipelinedPeerWithDriver :: forall ps (st :: ps) pr dstate m a. MonadAsync m => Driver ps pr dstate m -> PeerPipelined ps pr st m a -> m (a, dstate)
name: runPipelinedPeerWithDriver

display_html:
data Codec ps failure m bytes = Codec {
  • encode :: forall (st :: ps) (st' :: ps). StateTokenI st => ActiveState st => Message ps st st' -> bytes
  • decode :: forall (st :: ps). ActiveState st => StateToken st -> m (DecodeStep bytes failure m (SomeMessage st))
}
name: Codec Codec encode decode

display_html: hoistCodec :: Functor n => (forall x. m x -> n x) -> Codec ps failure m bytes -> Codec ps failure n bytes
name: hoistCodec

display_html: isoCodec :: Functor m => (bytes -> bytes') -> (bytes' -> bytes) -> Codec ps failure m bytes -> Codec ps failure m bytes'
name: isoCodec

display_html: mapFailureCodec :: Functor m => (failure -> failure') -> Codec ps failure m bytes -> Codec ps failure' m bytes
name: mapFailureCodec

display_html:
data DecodeStep bytes failure m a
  • = DecodePartial (Maybe bytes -> m (DecodeStep bytes failure m a))
  • | DecodeDone a (Maybe bytes)
  • | DecodeFail failure
name: DecodeStep DecodePartial DecodeDone DecodeFail

display_html: runDecoder :: Monad m => [bytes] -> DecodeStep bytes failure m a -> m (Either failure a)
name: runDecoder

display_html: runDecoderPure :: Monad m => (forall b. m b -> b) -> m (DecodeStep bytes failure m a) -> [bytes] -> Either failure a
name: runDecoderPure

display_html: hoistDecodeStep :: Functor n => (forall x. m x -> n x) -> DecodeStep bytes failure m a -> DecodeStep bytes failure n a
name: hoistDecodeStep

display_html: isoDecodeStep :: Functor m => (bytes -> bytes') -> (bytes' -> bytes) -> DecodeStep bytes failure m a -> DecodeStep bytes' failure m a
name: isoDecodeStep

display_html: mapFailureDecodeStep :: Functor m => (failure -> failure') -> DecodeStep bytes failure m a -> DecodeStep bytes failure' m a
name: mapFailureDecodeStep

data AnyMessage ps where

  • pattern AnyMessageAndAgency :: forall ps. () => forall (st :: ps) (st' :: ps). (StateTokenI st, ActiveState st) => StateToken st -> Message ps st st' -> AnyMessage ps
name: AnyMessage AnyMessage AnyMessageAndAgency

name: prop_codecM

name: prop_codec_binary_compatM

display_html: prop_codec_binary_compat :: forall psA psB failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage psA)) => (forall a. m a -> a) -> Codec psA failure m bytes -> Codec psB failure m bytes -> (forall (stA :: psA). StateToken stA -> SomeState psB) -> AnyMessage psA -> Bool
name: prop_codec_binary_compat

display_html: prop_codecs_compatM :: forall ps failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage ps), forall a. Monoid a => Monoid (m a)) => Codec ps failure m bytes -> Codec ps failure m bytes -> AnyMessage ps -> m Bool
name: prop_codecs_compatM

display_html: type Client ps pl st m a = Peer ps AsClient pl st m a
name: Client

display_html: pattern Yield :: forall ps pl st m a. () => forall st'. (StateTokenI st, StateTokenI st', StateAgency st ~ ClientAgency, Outstanding pl ~ Z) => Message ps st st' -> Client ps pl st' m a -> Client ps pl st m a
name: Yield

display_html: pattern Await :: forall ps pl st m a. () => (StateTokenI st, StateAgency st ~ ServerAgency, Outstanding pl ~ Z) => (forall st'. Message ps st st' -> Client ps pl st' m a) -> Client ps pl st m a
name: Await

name: YieldPipelined

display_html: pattern Collect :: forall ps st n c m a. () => (StateTokenI st, ActiveState st) => Maybe (Client ps (Pipelined (S n) c) st m a) -> (c -> Client ps (Pipelined n c) st m a) -> Client ps (Pipelined (S n) c) st m a
name: Collect
